text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Why did you not tell the American PEOPLE the CDC was not rolling out the coronavirus testing due to Contamination & the W.H.O offered to send the US much needed TESTING material but YOU refused - as POTUS U have the final word - & refused the help 

https://t.co/sCYk53VDlm
